import React from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import createDeck from "./CreateDeck"; export default function DisplayDeck({deck, cards, deckPage = false}){ const cardList = cards.filter(card => card.deckId === deck.id) return (
{deck.name}

{cardList.length} cards

{deck.description}

{(deckPage) && }
) }
